```{r people, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, layout="l-body-outset", fig.width=6}

#' #################################
#' load libraries and set seed
#' #################################
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)


#' #####################################
#' read bio data
#' #####################################
read_csv("people/MOTIONPeopleWithSurv_DATA.csv") |> 
  identity() -> motion_people



#' #####################################
#' concatenate bio data to paragraph and read photos
#' #####################################
motion_people |> 
  mutate(your_pronouns = gsub(pattern = "\\(|\\)", replacement = "", x = your_pronouns)) |> 
  mutate(biography = glue("<b>{your_first_name} {your_middle_initial} {your_last_name}, {your_credentials}</b> ({your_pronouns}) is {your_title} at the University of Pennsylvania. {your_work_background} {your_focus} {your_interests} Additional information can be found at: {your_website}", .na = "")) |>
  mutate(headshot_path = paste0("./people/headshots/",your_photo)) |> 
  select(headshot_path, biography) |> 
  identity() -> motion_bios

motion_bios |> 
  gt() |> 
  #gt::cols_label(headshot_path = "", biography = "") |> 
  gt::tab_options(column_labels.hidden = TRUE) |> 
  gt::cols_align(align = "center", columns = headshot_path) |> 
  gt::cols_align(align = "left", columns = biography) |> 
  gt::fmt_markdown(biography) |> 
  gt_img_rows(columns = headshot_path, img_source = "local", height = 200) |> 
  gt::cols_width(headshot_path ~ px(300))



```
